issue.title: [C++][Python] Add Scalar constructor of RoundToMultipleOptions to Python
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15965](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15965). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
[RoundToMultipleOptions](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/compute/api_scalar.h#L126) contains a constructor with a `shared_ptr<Scalar>` type but the [Python binding](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/python/pyarrow/includes/libarrow.pxd#L1959) is missing this constructor variant. This currently prevents using `Decimal` types in pyarrow.
